prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a unique pattern and soft fins.
Generate an aquatic creature with a round body and playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a simple fish to a majestic creature.
Design a small, water-dwelling Pokemon with a charming face and scale patterns.
Make a friendly fish Pokemon that thrives in both fresh and saltwater.
Show me a Pokemon that has a quirky look and is often underestimated.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique color scheme that stands out in its habitat.
